nwn-lib-d tools

nwn-gff

Serialize / deserialize GFF files (bic, utc, jrl, ...).

  • Dump GFF content
  • Quickly serialize/deserialize to JSON
  • Modify GFF fields
  • Same serialization algorithm as NWN2 game engine
  • Suited for git diff

master Linux x86 Download
master Linux x86_64 Download

nwn-tlk

Serialize TLK files to readable text.

  • Dump TLK content to text
  • Suited for git diff

nwn-erf

Create, extract or view ERF files (hak, erf, mod).

  • Create reproducible HAKs (the date field is set to 1900-01-01 by default)
  • Dump HAK metadata

master Linux x86 Download

nwn-bdb

View/search Bioware/foxpro database content (dbf + ctx + fpt) using regular expressions.

  • Find deleted campaign variables
  • Coloured output (ANSI colours)

nwn-trn

TRN/TRX terrain, water, walkmesh import/export and bake tool

  • Reduce TRX file size
  • Import/Export content to Wavefront OBJ and DDS files
  • Experimental walkmesh baking tool (placeables and walkmesh cutters not supported)
